data.message:
Here my shoes, put them on, I want you to see my vision. 

I'm going to the top, that's something I forgot to mention. 

I'm on a mission, to show that I am gifted, when I'm spittin this written. 

I have a story to tell, I've been threw hell, but that ain't none of yo business. 

I smoke I drank, hoping one day this pain will be missin. 

They say I'm trippin, actin funny, you gettin a little different. 

God is asking me why have I came a little bit distant. 

I try to get closer, break it down, roll it up, and lick it. 

Add a beat, a flow, and some rhymes, now thats cookin in the kitchen. 

When you hear what's in the making it will start to grab your attention.

.....just hear me out
